description:
DU/ER made the ultimate jeans even better with All-Weather denim. Weatherproof performance takes their versatility up a level. Lined with a waterproof breathable-membrane, they block wind and won't let you freeze when caught in the rain. Heavy-duty flat seams and reflective details mean you can ride home in the dark and stay comfortable and safe as well as dry.

  • Made of cotton blended with Coolmax® polyester and LYCRA®
  • Coolmax fibres helps wick away moisture and combined with cotton you get improved breathability
  • Lined with polyester windproof and waterproof-breathable membrane, keeping you dry when caught out the rain
  • Flat-stitched side seams hug the body and don't cause hot spots on the move
  • Invisible gusset for comfort
  • Reflective DU/ER logo on inside cuff lets you roll your jeans for increased visibility
  • Reinforced rear pockets and extra-deep front pockets mean you have room for all your EDC essentials
  • Jeans are not seam sealed (DU/ER found it compromised breathability), so in a true downpour you will still want rain pants
  • Slim fit has an athletic, tailored look
name: DU/ER All Weather Performance Denim Slim Pants - Men's
